Title: Prohibits private insurers from charging co-payments for an annual pediatric eye exam completed by an optometrist or ophthalmologist
Summary: Prohibits private insurers from charging co-payments for an annual pediatric eye exam completed by an optometrist or ophthalmologist.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law, in relation to prohibiting private insurers from charging co-payments for an annual pediatric eye exam completed by an optometrist or ophthalmologist
